overview: Karim Pourak is the co-founder and Technology Lead of Genophen Inc. He has been working in the commercial software industry since 1992 beginning with the Research & Development Department of Asea Brown Boveri Ltd. in Helsinki Finland. Utilizing his broad range of skills Karim has fulfilled a variety of roles from Senior Developer, Business Analyst, Data Analyst, Database Administrator, UI Designer as well as Project Manager, System Architect and Chief Technology Officer. Karim has greatly extended his knowledge and experience by consulting for the past four years at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) Management Information Systems Offices as Technology Lead and System Architect.
